website_summaries.verdict: A skin-loving peel that's made with quality ingredients. However, frequent use may be necessary and costly.
pros: Does a great job removing dead skin cells and softening skin with dedicated use, thanks in part to skin-nourishing fruit acids
cons: Pricey for one pair of masks, and you may need more than one set to get noticeable results
Can be harsh on sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE for “MAN FEET”
customer_reviews.text: My husbands feet....needed some attention. He isn’t a fussy guy and also just didn’t really care. The price and low hassle convinced him to give this a try and IT MADE SUCH A DIFFERENCE. He wore the booties for a full 90 minutes and then soaked his feet for about 20 minutes for the next three nights and then gently scrubbing with a wash cloth. We will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Emily R. Spurgin

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend they don't work
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't work. I followed the directions and got ZERO results. I've bought ones on wish for $1 that actually worked... Highly dissatisfied payed 14× as much this time and still nothing. Not to mention slow shipping
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Softer feet
customer_reviews.text: My feet feel brand new, these little booties work SO WELL!! After all the shedding my feet were seriously softer and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This product did make my feet slightly softer but there was no peeling of the skin and I still need a pedicure. Personally, I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Best product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Kept Them on for the 90 minutes. Peeling started the very next day! My feet are so smooth and Soft after using this product. I will definitely be purchasing again. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Get something else
customer_reviews.text: These don't work. I followed all the directions, and nothing peeled off after.
customer_reviews.author: olga

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money.
customer_reviews.text: It did absolutely nothing for me or my boyfriends feet at all. It feels like a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: A gentle foot peel that works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was always afraid to try those foot peels because I heard they are so harsh on your skin (and God knows what ingredients they use to make your skin peel so aggressively!) A friend told me about Barefoot Scientist version of the “foot peel” concept and I knew I had to try it. I also knew that whatever they used as ingredients would be safe for my body, and I was right. This was a much gentler formula and worked just as good (if not better) then the competitors. My feet feel baby soft and I didn’t need to use harsh chemicals to get me there. I will be using this every few months for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Omg soooo good!!! Will buy again and recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: MAMAMAMAMA

customer_reviews.title: Put simply - these did not do a thing
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions exactly. It was a waste of time and money because nothing at all happened. No peeling whatsoever. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: n1njade

customer_reviews.title: do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: these did nothing to my feet. and they smelled like fingernail polish remover.
customer_reviews.author: kj

product_meta.title: Barefoot Scientist Reboot Ultra-Soft Exfoliating Foot Peel, For Lasting Foot Softness
feature_bullets: GENTLE DEEP PEEL FORMULA: Achieve a full skin renewal cycle in about a week. Unlike other harsh acidic peels that aggressively strip skin, Reboot uses milder alpha-hydroxy acids to shed away dead skin layers and reveal new, softer skin with just one use. This is the perfect ‘first time’ foot peel for people who are worried about exposure to high acid formulations or who have sensitive skin.

KICK BACK AND EXFOLIATE: Relax and let Reboot do the work. These booties are powered with antioxidant-rich fruit extracts that moisturize while milder alpha-hydroxy acids work to shed layers of dead skin.

EASY TO USE: Clean and soak feet, then dry and place inside booties. Close with the attached adhesive tape and thoroughly coat the skin. Leave for 90 minutes, then rinse and dry to clean off remaining gel. Soaking feet in the following days will accelerate the exfoliation process. If peeling does not appear to occur after several days, gently wash feet with warm water and a washcloth to assist with cell turnover.
REDUCE AND ELIMINATE SKIN BUILD UP: As part of a seasonal pampering ritual, use Reboot to gently remove hardened skin. Full rejuvenation may take up to 2 weeks to complete.

SAFE AND EFFECTIVE: Our blend of powerful ingredients from nature and science is formulated for maximum effectiveness, and is hypoallergenic, vegan, dermatologist tested, free of phthalates and parabens, cruelty free and Leaping Bunny certified.
